BluetoothSubMenu.delete_saved_device: Are you sure you want to delete this Bluetooth device ?

guide_intro:
The Bentley Entertainment System allows you to view
and hear content streamed from your mobile device
connected via Wi-Fi or from a compatible device
connected through HDMI or USB.
guide_input:
to establish a wireless connection
between your device and the screen
or touch the screensaver
and scan the QR code.
guide_output:
to connect Bluetooth headphones
or press the audio sharing button to
send audio output to the car speakers.
Audio is also available through wired headphones.
guide_source:
to choose your desired content.
You can view content from external providers
by selecting the service from the list shown.
The browser can also be reset in this menu.
guide_xlink:
to view content currently shown on
the companion screen.
Note: if selecting Crosslink when audio sharing is active,
audio and volume controls are unavailable.
guide_hdmi:
Content can be played from a HDMI source
when a compatible device is connected.
Note: if no content is playing on the HDMI device
when selected, the screen will appear blank.
guide_usb:
Media can be played through a compatible device
connected via USB when using the
Bentley Entertainment Control app.
quick_start_content: Scan the QR code using the camera on your device or by using the Entertainment Control app
quick_start_wifi:
Scan the QR code to connect to
the screen via Wi-Fi
software_reset:
By restoring the system, all settings will be reset.
All personal data included saved networks, Bluetooth devices and passwords will be deleted. Are you sure you want to reset?
software_reset_success:
Factory settings have been restored
 System will be reboot in few seconds
max_waring_content:
Please select the screen name as the Bluetooth
Audio source on the infotainment system.
Maximum volume is determined by
infotainment master volume.

mediaSource.resetBrowerContent:
Are you sure you want to reset the browser?
All account information will be lost and you will need to log in again.

accoff_extend_use:
The {0} Entertainment System
will shutdown in {1} seconds.
Press OK to extend use.
accoff_warning: The Bentley Entertainment System is shutting down...

you would like to assign this screen

and press start. 
Audio will be muted
during the sync process.

IVI_Main_Text:
Please select the screen name as the Bluetooth

IVI_Sync_Main_Text:
Select the screen name as the
Bluetooth audio source on
the infotainment system.
Check the volume and
reduce background noise.
Press START when the
system is ready.

Max_Volume_Notification: Screen volume set to maximum.\nIncrease your infotainment system volume.
Menu_Help_Crosslink:
Select CROSSLINK to view content currently shown
on the companion screen. Note: if selecting crosslink
when audio sharing is active, audio and volume
controls are unavailable.
Menu_Help_HDMI:
Content can be played from a HDMI source
when a compatible device is connected.
Note: if no content is playing on the HDMI device
when selected, the screen will appear blank.
Menu_Help_Input:
Select INPUT to connect to a Wi-Fi network.
This enables you to stream content through 
external providers or to establish a connection
with your device to share content.
Menu_Help_Intro:
The Bentley Entertainment System allows you to view
and hear content from your mobile device connected
via Wi-Fi or from a compatible device connected
through HDMI or USB.
Menu_Help_Output:
Select OUTPUT to connect Bluetooth headphones
or press the audio sharing button to
send audio output to the car speakers.
Audio is also available through wired headphones.
Menu_Help_Source:
Select SOURCE to choose your desired content.
You can view content from external providers
by selecting the service from the list shown. 
The browser can also be reset in this menu.
Menu_Help_USB: Media can be played through a compatible device\nconnected via USB when using the\nBentley Entertainment Control app.
Notification_Full_Screen_Unavailable: Full screen mode is currently unavailable
Notification_Temperature: Screen temperature too high. System will\nswitch off soon to avoid being damaged.
PIN_Entry_Main_Text: Please enter the\nPIN for your\nBluetooth device
Reset_Browser_Main_Text: Are you sure you want to reset the browser?\nAll account information will be lost\nand you will need to log in again.

screenOffNotification.setting: Please tap the screen to switch on

Software_Reset_Main_Text:
By restoring the system, all settings will be
reset. All personal data including saved
networks, Bluetooth devices and passwords
will be deleted.

Are you sure you want to reset?
Software_Reset_Successful_Main_Text: Factory settings have been restored\nSystem will restart shortly
Update_Unavailable_Main_Text: Unable to check for updates\nPlease try again later
Use_Extension_Main_Text_PL: The Bentley Entertainment System\nwill shut down in {0} seconds.\nPress OK to extend use.
Use_Extension_Main_Text_SG: The Bentley Entertainment System\nwill shut down in {0} second.\nPress OK to extend use.
